TopicTitle: Question, How to use image tags?

Articles.Content:
So, after a while i figured out how to take and post screen shots. But they are only links, for example(just sharing this picture because i love the photobomb, i didn't notice it until after i took the picture) :http://imgur.com/Bkr20Cg

I have heard people use image tags to post pictures without a link. I use imgur. How would i write out an image tag, for example, for this picture?

Any help is appreciated, i couldn't find a clear example of how to write one.

Edited December 31, 2013 by Mr.Rocket

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/misc.php?do=bbcode

Also, in Imgur, you can click on your image in the main screen after you upload it, it will bring up a box and you can copy the BB code straight from the box.

Pretty simple with imgur, you have to put your album information, in this case Bkr20Cg in this format without the spaces [ imgur] Bkr20Cg [/ imgur]

If it is a single picture just click on the imgur pic you want to link and it should have a share option, choose the forum BB code that is correct for these forums.
